@@ -0,0 +1,1 @@
+Tool
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@

+ * Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.

+
+import java.io.PrintWriter;
+import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
+
+public class Tool implements ToolProvider {
+    @Override
+    public String name() {
+        return "Tool";
+    }
+
+    @Override
+    public int run(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args) {
+        out.println("Tool/out");
+        err.println("Tool/err");
+        return 0;
+    }
+}

@@ -44,0 +44,1 @@
+import java.util.spi.ToolProvider;
@@ -48,0 +49,6 @@
+            ServiceLoader.load(ToolProvider.class, CLTest.class.getClassLoader()).stream()
+                    .map(ServiceLoader.Provider::get)
+                    .filter(toolProvider -> toolProvider.name().equals("Tool"))
+                    .findFirst()
+                    .orElseThrow();
+
@@ -57,1 +64,3 @@
-                "p/q/CLTest.java", // (re)source files part of the multi-file protocol
+                "Tool.java",
+                "Tool.class",
+                "p/q/CLTest.java",
